“Uh.... The expedition?” You raise an eyebrow at Ayla.

She pauses.

“Wait. What?” She responds.

“Yeah, that's what I came all the way over here for.” You nod. “What's the deal?”

“I don't... You said you wanted to talk in private, right? When we got out of the meeting?” She asks. “That was...”

“About the expedition.” You respond. “I've got some sensitive information, remember?”

She looks exasperated. “About?”

> “The Sanctum, and Kjorikos. I imagine we have a lot to discuss.”
> “The Expedition—but also, Freakshow and their leader.”
> “Later. First, what are you up to down here?”
> Other
name: Sylvetica
